General.Name: Lionheart Acquisition Corporation II
General.Description: Lionheart Acquisition Corporation II intends to effect a merger, capital stock exchange, asset acquisition, stock purchase, reorganization, or similar business combination with one or more businesses. It intends to focus its efforts in businesses that apply digital technologies and technology-enhanced services and solutions to the identification, design, development, construction, operation, financing, management, and disposition of real estate properties. The company was founded in 2019 and is based in Miami, Florida.
General.Address: 4218 NE 2nd Avenue, Miami, FL, United States, 33137
